duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform pre-underwriting reviews of new and renewal business to determine completeness.
Document observations made during pre-reviews of files to assist underwriters.
Assist underwriter by reviewing fleet accounts to determine if all required information is provided.
Complete fleet pre-reviews and set up the fleet underwriting tool.
Decline submissions which are significantly outside of underwriting guidelines.
Amend or update quotes based on instructions of underwriters.
Complete renewal pre-reviews and may approve renewal referrals within authority.
Review inspection reports and determine if additional underwriting review is required.
Produce written correspondence to be sent to agents and customers for compliance purposes.

education_certification.credential: 1+ years of experience as an Underwriter Assistant
